channel.title: The very best fitness, weight-loss & cycling holidays
channel.description: The very best fitness, weight-loss & cycling holidays

item.title: Fitness & Weight-Loss Holidays in Spain: Marbella
item.description:
Fitness & Weight-Loss Holidays in Spain: Marbella

Join us for a fitness & weight loss holiday in Spain. At our centre in Marbella on the Sunny Costa Del Sol, you can enjoy an intensive, focused and fun 4 or 7-day fitness & weight-loss holiday. Our fitness & weight loss holidays in Spain combine an invigorating training schedule with nutritious meals, a fabulous location and rejuvenating spa services.

item.title: Fitness & Weight-Loss Retreat in Ibiza
item.description:
Fitness & Weight-Loss Retreat in Ibiza

Enjoy a 6-night fitness and weight loss retreat on the beautiful island of Ibiza. Our fitness & weight loss retreat in Ibiza is designed to increase your fitness levels and help you to achieve the body shape you want.

item.title: Fitness & Weight-Loss Holidays in Turkey
item.description:
Fitness & Weight-Loss Holidays in Turkey

Enjoy a fitness & weight-loss holiday in Turkey, in a 5-star resort in Alanya. Join us for a week of focused fitness training that will help you to achieve your fitness & weight-loss goals Our fitness & weight loss holidays in Turkey are for anyone wanting to lose weight quickly & healthily.

item.title: Totally Flexible Weight Loss and Fitness Holidays in Spain
item.description:
Totally Flexible Weight Loss and Fitness Holidays in Spain

Just like our weight loss holidays in Alicante, our weight loss and fitness holidays in Antequera, near Malaga, fit around your schedule. You can book your holiday for as long as you like and you can arrive and depart on any day of the week.

item.title: Totally Flexible Yoga & Fitness Holidays in Italy
item.description:
Totally Flexible Yoga & Fitness Holidays in Italy

Just like our holidays in Antequera and Denia in Spain, our yoga and fitness holidays in Italy fit around schedule. You can book for as long as you like and you can arrive and depart on any day of the week from Easter to October.

item.title: Totally Flexible Weight Loss Holidays in Spain
item.description:
Totally Flexible Weight Loss Holidays in Spain

Our weight-loss holidays in Spain are based at the stunning 5-star Marriott La Sella Golf Resort & Spa near Denia, in the northern Costa Blanca. The resort is situated in the Montg√≥ Natural Park, just an hour north of Alicante Airport and 15 minutes' drive from Denia, with its historical centre and unspoilt beaches.

item.title: The Light Phone: Designed for Disconnecting
item.description:
The Light Phone: Designed for Disconnecting

Phone addiction is real-as evidenced by a quick glance down the street, in the subway, even at the dinner table-and is one of the reasons why Apple developed a watch: so we would look at our screens less and be present more. For some, however, a smartwatch isn't enough-it still leaves room for fiddling and distraction.

item.title: Twin peaks: Vollebak's high-tech sportswear aids recovery.
item.description:
Twin peaks: Vollebak's high-tech sportswear aids recovery.

Hi-tech sportswear generally makes a number of simple promises, usually concentrating on the during of what you do rather than the before or after. New London-based adventure clothing brand Vollebak takes a more experimental, tangential approach to performance enhancement.
